question: The World Sports Journalist Day (WSJD) is observed on which date?
explanation: The World Sports Journalists Day (WSJD) is observed every year on July 2 to mark the services of sports journalists for the promotion of sports. The purpose of the day is to encouraged sports journalists to strive for excellence in their work and to set an example to the world â€“ not only to the world of sport, but to the world at large.
